altername_name: Lost in Harmony: The Musical Odyssey
name: Lost in Harmony
overview: The first musical runner! Dive into a fantastic musical odyssey, brought by an immersive soundtrack imagined by famous composers. Experience music in a new way with the combination of rhythmic tapping and choreographed running. Discover the musical story from the co-creator of Valiant Hearts as you guide Kaito and Aya through their adventures, in total harmony with the music.
